Now a little more about the Alpini: 1 - Alpini , most composed by volunteers at that time, was the Italian force which defeated the German army during the first world war. Due to this fact still Alpini is in the Heart of the most old Italian people. For example I saw a very old man, older than 70 years, cheering gracefully for the Alpini and waving the Italian flag in the air. 2 - As you might now Italy has been divided to 20 urlLink regions . Each region has its own Alpini group. Some of these groups used specific and unique way to come to Trieste. A part of Triviso group carrying all the needed equipments on their shoulders (tents, ...) came on foot. Their trip should have taken 3-4 days. A group composed of about 20 people from Venezzia came on 20 mules. 3 - It is more than 6 years that I have decided not to clap for or welcome any kind of army forces, regardless of the fact they are trained either for the defense or the attack. You know, because in fact they have developed special sophisticated methods to eliminate humans under different names. I was standing in the pavement looking at the march of the Alpini. They didn't have any special uniform except that Robin-hood like hat. I was staying at the same place for more than one hour. After this time the people who were around me went away and no one was around me. When some of the old-happy group alpini passed away in front of me, they looked at me and clapped and they expected me to reply. I could not stand the situation and I clapped them back. 4 - Have you ever seen the movies about the first world war that the Germans have lost and the Italian are in street marching gratefully. It was some moments that I found myself in these kind of situations. 5 - I should say that I do not know the Italian very well however I guess that some Alpini people had not been very polite. I saw some scenes that a group of them were telling some note polite things to young ladies and some times the ladies became angry. Even some more funny scenes that a group of Alpini was walking on the pavement and a girl was coming on the same side from the opposite directions. Sometimes the girl passed the street without being careful about the red-lights or zebra-crosses to avoid facing with the Alpini group. However I must outline that I did not observe these behaviors for many times.

Science getting old: People who are familiar with computer programming know that every program get old. When you find a bug in your program usually you do not change the whole structure of the program you just add a patch to it. Having followed this strategy for a while the programme become insufficient and really old. In today science one is not supposed to learn everything. Usually one should take the words of others granted and add a simple contribution to them. This strategy has been followed by so many researchers. Consequently the structure of present science seems not to be the best one. There are too many simple concepts that have been expressed in complicated ways. ... Holy Book in Science: Every one seems to have a holy book. Religious people have Koran, Bible , ... . In the String theory the book by witten, green, Schwartz is the holy book.

How would you feel if you had been in my shoes? 1-After quite a long time my friends invited me for a Pizza in a pizzeria. We were about 10 people intending to go out for dinner. I arrived 20 mins. Early than the scheduled time. It was rainy therefore I went inside the pizzeria. Using my poor Italian knowledge I asked for a table for 10 people. The time was passing and no one came. More I waited , no results , and no one at all. Later I found that it had been a joke by my dear friends. I should add that I really felt ashamed when I was paying. At that time the pizzeria was crowded and they missed many customers. 2- After this joke, I used to have pizza alone. Once I was in pizzeria. However it took quite a long time to get my pizza. Therefore I started to finish a computation by my colorful pens red, green and blue on the paper-towels. I finished it exactly in time. When I was folding the paper-towels carefully to use in later time I looked at the face of the waitress. Her face really went blank. I followed her sight. It was exactly toward my table. I looked at the surface of the table and i realized what a mess has been done to the elegant table sheet. It was the track of all of my computations on it, beautifully in three colors. 3- You go to a bar and ask for a Coffee. After putting sugar in your coffee and when you have moved the tea-spoon in the Coffee you realize that the tea-spoon has changed and it is really big. At the same time you feel all people are looking at you.

I never had tried to follow what is called the fashion in my social life. Better way saying I should confess I never understood what and why some people call something fashion. The day before yesterday I talked about my scientific project with a quite well-known physicist. Using the simplest possible language, I told in the most precise and concise way what I have done and what good applications the computation has. After a while I was told that the computation is quite good but there exists a problem. He told me that I had not followed the fashion, therefore the work is not of a big value. I did not know that even the researchers must follow the fashion. By the way I have not accepted his words about the fashion in science ,have you?

There are the things that I hate. When I keep saying that I hate them over and over, I find that I do not hate anymore. I will find myself that I just don't like them. When I keep saying that I don't like them after a while I realize that infact I have no any feeling for them. At this point if I keep saying that I do not have any feeling I will find that I like them. If I keep saying that I like them I will find that I love them. The bad point is that when I keep saying that I love them after a while I will find that I hate them and I return to the place I had been before. I do hate the psychological loop in my mind, ... . do I hate it or love it ? ... I don't know.

حدود دو سه دقیقه حرف زدن ملکی به من گفت : تو آبروی دانشگاه رو بردی. من برق سه فاز از سرم پرید و نمی دانستم قرار است به چی متهم بشم. ملکی با آرامش ادامه داد: افرادی مثل تو که دروس لازم را پاس نکرده اند ولی تعداد زیادی واحدهای فوق و دکترا را گرفته اند وقتی کارنامه ی شان را به دانشگاههای خارجی می فرستند آبروی ما را می برندو .... . و من با چشمانی بهت زده از اتاقش خارج شدم. در پایان سال چهارم وقتی رسما هنوز دانشجو بودم یک گواهی اشتغال به تحصیل لازم داشتم. آموزش دانشگاه این گواهی را به من نداد و گفت این جور گواهی ها را معمولا ریاست هر دانشکده صادر می کند. صبح روز بعد رفتم دفتر ایرجی . نبودش از منشی دانشکده تقاضا کردم یک گواهی ساده مبنی بر دانشجو بودن من تایپ کند که وقتی ایرجی برگشت کار چندانی باقی نمانده باشد. ایرجی ساعت پنج بر می گشت. در این فاصله من یک تهران گردی از پل چوبین به جاهای مختلف داشتم. به دانشکده برگشتم و ایرجی اومد. من تقاضای گواهی کردم قبول نکرد . واقعا خسته بود. گفتم: نگاه کنید من تمام کارها رو انجام دادم کار چندانی باقی نمانده و فقط امضای شمالازم است. وقتی نامه را دید فورا عصبانی شد و من را متهم به تایپ نامه جعلی کرد. خنده دار بود. پرسیدم :« جعلی فرض کردن نامه چه عوابقی می تونه داشته باشد». گفت:«از دانشگاه اخراجت می کنم». با خوشحالی گفتم :«پس هنوز دانشجو هستم. لطف کنید قبل از اخراجم یک گواهی مبنی بر دانشجو بودنم بهم بدید». بیچاره جوش آورد و یادش رفت که همه چیز فرضی بود. دیگه به حرفای من گوش نمی داد. بازی خنده داری شروع شده بود. روبروی ایرجی نامه را تاریخ زدم و پایش را امضا کردم . یک فکر آنی هم به ذهنم رسید. پایین نامه رو پاره کردم و ما بقی را تحویل ایرجی دادم. ایرجی پرسید چرا نامه رو پاره کردم ؟ گفتم :«چون مهر زده بودم و جرمم دیگه خیلی سنگین می شد.» پرسید چه مهری؟ گفتم مهر دانشکده فیزیک که از دانشکده ی ریاضی امانت گرفته بودم. وقتی داشتم از در بیرون می رفتم داشتم فکر می کردم مهر فیزیک در دانشکده ی ریاضی؟ این داستان را با این جزییات تا به حال برای کسی بازگو نکرده بودم. زیبایی اینجاست که کمیته ی انظباتی شریف من را متهم به جعل نامه و امضا نمود. ایرجی و شوهرش این داستان را از منظر خودشان برای همه تعریف کردند. اما من حتی به نزدیک ترین دوستانم نگفتم. حالا باور کنید که از داستان نیمه کامل خسته شدم. اگر فرض کنیم که سیستم قضایی ایران گسترشی طبیعی از کمیته ی انضباتی دانشگاه است من به این سیستم اعتماد ندارم و لی تا مادامی که لازم نباشد به آن اعتراض نمی کنم.

این گونه که بوش می یاد گویا به زودی علم روانشناسی به جایی می رسد که در باره ی درستی یا نادرستی سخن بعضی ها که هر از گاه وبیگاه ادعاهایی در مورد رسیدن به حضور مهدی می کنند تصمیم بگیرد. این مطلب پایین را بخوانید Where is God in the Brain? A British study reported that epileptics had 'profoundly spiritual experiences' in a specific region of the brain. In other studies, there was also a region of the brain that became extremely active when subjects were shown religious pictures and when they were asked to engage in any thoughts about God. In the late 1990s, several California neuroscientists discovered the region of the human brain responsible for tuning into God and other religious experiences. They identified the right temporal lobe - which is in front of and just above the right ear (and includes parts of the limbic system) and considered one of the central areas for processing memories and emotions - as the 'God Spot' or the 'God module.' This area of the brain was most active when subjects were experiencing or communicating with The Supreme Being, as well as during near death experiences (NDE). Over the years, there have been cases of certain types of epilepsy that have promoted higher states of religiosity. Twenty-five percent of the individuals who are victims of right temporal lobe damage report 'seeing God's face' and 'hearing God's voice.' Disease or damage to the same region brings forth religious visions, feelings of ecstasy, and related phenomena. Prominent religious figures such as Joan of Arc were reported to have shown several of the classic symptoms of someone suffering from temporal lobe epilepsy (TLE) complete with revelations, insights, and visions accompanied by seizures, many of the ingredients for the archetypal epiphany.
